Articles.Content:
The Hypervotalin is designed for travelling to planets inside the orbit of Planet Kerbal. It has a tri-coupler setup with M-50 liquid fuel engines for the first stage. Then it uses a standard RT-10 solid rocket to propel it into a solar orbit, where after a small liquid engine gives it the final boost to make sure it doesn\'t fall back to Kerbal.

The full power of the first stage isn\'t realised until you get out of the atmosphere and start making your vertical m/s much faster

Requires C7 pack, and NovaPunch 0.3
